Hello!
UnmanagedServers is running a $45 for a dedicated server promotion on all of our dedicated servers for a grand opening sort of thing! :D

Link to Order: http://unmanagedservers.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=21
Promo Code to bring it down from $50 to $45: $5OFFDEDICATED

Detailed Server Specifications:
Atom 1.6GHz - 1.86 GHz
2 Cores/ 2 Threads
4 GB DDR3 RAM
2TB SATA Drive
100Mbit Unmetered Monthly Transfer
5 usable IPv4 Address

You can choose from the latest version of each of following 64-bit Operating Systems: CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu
Please note there is a non-refundable one-time setup fee of $50.
